member.name: T:PostMicroservice.Controllers.ContentController
member.summary: Content controller to perform crud operations.

members.member:
Returns list of all contents.
Title of the content List of all contents /// Example of request \ GET '/api/contents' \
Success, returns list of all contents. No contents found. Server error.

Returns a content based on the forwarded id.
ID of the content /// Example of request \ GET '/api/contents/' \ param 'contentId = 2959689a-c09f-4c0b-6ceb-08d96643ade7'
Success, returns the specified content. A content with that ID does not exist. Server error.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.ContentController.UpdateContent(PostMicroservice.Models.ContentDTO.ContentUpdateDTO,System.String)
member.param: Model of the content to be updated.
member.remarks: Example of request \ PUT /api/contents \ --header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ { \ "contentID" : "2959689a-c09f-4c0b-6ceb-08d96643ade7",\ "title" : "Prodaja rolera",\ "text" : "Prodajem rolere stare 6 mjeseci, u odličnom stanju.",\ "replacement" : false,\ "state" : "odlicno",\ "itemForSaleID" : 5 \ }
member.response: Bad request, object for sale with that ID does not exist.
A content with that ID does not exist.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.ContentController.DeleteContent(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Delete content based on the forwarded ID.
member.remarks: Example of request \ DELETE '/api/contents/'\ header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ param 'contentId = 2959689a-c09f-4c0b-6ceb-08d96643ade7'

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.ContentController.GetContentOptions
member.summary: Returns options for working with contents.

member.name: T:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PictureController
member.summary: Picture controller to perform crud operations.

members.member:
Returns list of all pictures.
ID of the post List of all pictures /// Example of request \ GET '/api/pictures' \ param 'postId = f684f7ae-b1b6-4dfa-a01c-7edc54c689db'
Success, returns list of all pictures. No pictures found. Server error.

Returns a picture based on the forwarded id.
ID of the picture /// Example of request \ GET 'https://localhost:44200/api/pictures/' \ param 'pictureId = da74fb64-4edc-468e-4373-08d9661a6abd'
Success, returns the specified picture. A photo with that ID does not exist. Server error.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PictureController.UpdatePicture(PostMicroservice.Models.PictureUpdateDTO,System.String)
member.param: Model of the picture to be updated.
member.remarks: Example of request \ PUT /api/pictures \ header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ { \ "pictureId" : "da74fb64-4edc-468e-4373-08d9661a6abd", \ "url" : "url",\ "postID" : "0c059681-6f1d-4663-c934-08d966e9793d" \ }
member.response: Bad request, post with that ID does not exist.
A picture with that ID does not exist.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PictureController.DeletePicture(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Delete picture based on the forwarded ID.
member.remarks: Example of request \ DELETE '/api/pictures/'\ header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ param 'pictureId = da74fb64-4edc-468e-4373-08d9661a6abd'

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PictureController.GetPictureOptions
member.summary: Returns options for working with pictures.

member.name: T:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PostController
member.summary: Post controller to perform crud operations.

members.member:
Returns list of all posts.
Date of publication post Username of the user who posted the post List of all posts /// Example of request \ GET '/api/posts' \ param 'dateOfPublication = 2021-08-24T12:25:11.1407013' \ param 'userName = milica_despotovic' \
Success, returns list of all posts. No posts found. Server error.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PostController.GetPostById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a post based on the forwarded id.
member.response: A post with that ID does not exist.

members.member:
/// Add new post.
Model of post Key for authorization user
Example of request \ POST /api/posts \ header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ { \ "contentId" : "2959689a-c09f-4c0b-6ceb-08d96643ade7", \ "userId" : 5 \ } \
Successfully added post. Bad request, user or content with that id does not exists. Unauthorized user. Server error.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PostController.UpdatePost(PostMicroservice.Models.PostDTO.PostUpdateDTO,System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: Model of the post to be updated.
member.remarks: Example of request \ PUT /api/posts \ header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ header 'accountId = 5' \ { \ "postID" : "0c059681-6f1d-4663-c934-08d966e9793d", \ "contentId" : "33676ac7-b6c2-446a-969a-60eccba73965", \ "userId" : 5 \ }
member.response: Bad request, content or user with that ID does not exist.
A post with that ID does not exist.

member.name: M:PostMicroservice.Controllers.PostController.DeletePost(System.Guid,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete post based on the forwarded ID.
member.remarks: Example of request \ DELETE '/api/posts/'\ header 'key: Bearer Milica' \ header 'accountId = 5' \ param 'postId = f684f7ae-b1b6-4dfa-a01c-7edc54c689db' \

member.summary: Returns options for working with posts.
